== Xubuntu Mailing Lists ==

There are currently two Xubuntu related mailing lists.

=== Xubuntu Help and User Discussions ===

This list is for discussion about using the Xubuntu distribution. For topics that also affect regular Ubuntu, please check the ubuntu-users list for quicker response times.
